Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Palette for cosmetics
Description: The design of this palette for cosmetics was modelled on the truncated, diamond-shaped palettes of the A-Group, though its shape is more sub-rectangular. Its manufacture is cruder than the above-mentioned and it is also thicker. Hewn from an opaque light grey quartz, it bears green traces on one side which are remains of malachite, a product often used in cosmetics by A-Group people.
